name: dropId
description: Element ID of the info drop.

name: endText
description: Text at the end of the info drop.

name: list
description: List of items to display in the info drop. Please refer to the component source for the `ContextualHelperDataListItem` type definition.

name: mode
description: Event that triggers the info drop.

name: readMoreLink
description: Link at the end of the info drop.

name: text
description: Text to display in the info drop.

name: toggle
description: CSS selector for the element to be used as toggle. By default, the preceding element is used.
